Body:
"""Test whether promt answer no works."""
with tmpdir.as_cwd():
    open('protein.tpr', 'a').close()
    result = cli_runner.invoke(cli, ['generate', '--module=gromacs/2016',
        '--host=draco', '--max-nodes=4', '--gpu', '--no-cpu',
        '--name=protein'], input='n\n')
    bundle = dtr.discover()
    assert result.exit_code == 1
    assert len(bundle) == 0
